oai_dc:dc.dc:title: On the Maxwell-Stefan diffusion limit for a mixture of monatomic gases
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Hutridurga, Harsha
Salvarani, Francesco
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Mathematics - Analysis of PDEs
35Q20, 35B25, 35Q35
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Multi-species Boltzmann equations for gaseous mixtures, with analytic cross sections and under Grad's angular cutoff assumption, are considered under diffusive scaling. In the limit, we formally obtain an explicit expression for the binary diffusion coefficients in the Maxwell-Stefan equations.
